column17: The Wahl James Martin Slow Cooker has a family-sized 5 litre ceramic crock pot and has been designed for cooking satisfying meals with ease. Come home to the warm and welcoming smell of home cooked soups casseroles and pot roasts. There are three 3 settings - Low High and Keep Warm;The crock pot can be removed and used for serving as well as being easy clean and dishwasher safe. Transparent toughened glass lid for easy viewing and cool touch handles. There is also a full length James Martin recipe demonstration DVD showing James using this appliance and others in the range demonstrating eight recipes. In addition to the demonstrations there are further 3 James Martin recipes for this appliance and a total of 23 James Martin recipes for you to try.Warranty : One Year from the impoter Customer Care No: 011-45112428
